//This needs to be saved in user settings, not in workspace settings
//so this file doesn't do anything, but copy it into user settings
[
  {
    "key": "ctrl+alt+1",
    "command": "workbench.action.tasks.runTask",
    "args": "Slides: Export2HTML (current notebook)",
    "when": "notebookEditorFocused",
  },
  {
    "key": "ctrl+alt+2",
    "command": "workbench.action.tasks.runTask",
    "args": "Slides: Export2PDF (current notebook)",
    "when": "notebookEditorFocused"
  },
  {
    "key": "ctrl+alt+e",
    "command": "workbench.action.tasks.runTask",
    "args": "Slides: Export2PDF (current notebook)",
    "when": "notebookEditorFocused"
  }
]
